sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function App() { return (
{/* Header */}

CRAVE CRATE

{/* Hero Section */}
{/* Background decoration */}

One crate to rule all cravings.

Freshly baked, beautifully packaged. Delivered to you.

{/* Why Choose Crave Crate Section */}

Why Choose Crave Crate?

üçû

Freshly Baked Daily

Made fresh every morning with premium ingredients.

üéÅ

Gift-Ready Packaging

Beautiful presentation that's occasion-ready.

üì¶

Curated Premium Boxes

New flavors and themes each month.

‚ö°

Lightning Fast Delivery

Same-day delivery in select cities.

{/* What Our Customers Say Section */}

What Our Customers Say

MC

Melvin Cuales

"The quality is absolutely incredible! Every bite is pure heaven."

EB

EJ Bido

"Perfect for gifting. The packaging is so beautiful and the taste is amazing."

{/* Ready To Satisfy Your Cravings Section */}
{/* Background decoration */}

Ready To Satisfy Your Cravings?

{/* FAQs Section */}

FAQs

‚ñ∫ Do you deliver nationwide?

{/* Footer */}
{/* Background decoration */}

CRAVE CRATE

Delivering Happiness, One Crate at a time.
